abstract: Anheuser-Busch InBev, the world’s largest brewer, said Thursday its investors had bought up nearly all the 6.4 billion euros ($8.27 billion) in new shares it sold to pay for the takeover that formed it last month.
lead_paragraph: Anheuser-Busch InBev, the world’s largest brewer, said Thursday its investors had bought up nearly all the 6.4 billion euros ($8.27 billion) in new shares it sold to pay for the takeover that formed it last month.

headline.main: A-B InBev Raises $8 Billion in New Shares
